channel.title: Softlayer_network_lbaas_l7member on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_lbaas_l7member on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member service allows consumers to manage (backend) members for L7 pools. A load balancer may have one or more L7 backend pools. A member can be added to one or more L7 backend pools. Deleting a backend member from one L7 pool will not remove it from other L7 pools to which it is associated. Weight of the backend member is a value between 1 and 256 but only applicable when the load balancing method configured is “Weighted Round Robin”.

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member represents the backend member for a L7 pool. It can be either a virtual server or a bare metal machine. Local address The IP address of a L7 pool member. Type: string createDate Type: dateTime id The ID of a L7 pool member. Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime

item.title: addL7PoolMembers
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member::addL7PoolMembers Add load balancer L7 members Overview Add server instances as members to a L7pool and return the LoadBalancer Object with listeners, pools and members populated Parameters Name Type Description l7PoolUuid string memberInstances SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member[] Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7MemberObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancer

item.title: deleteL7PoolMembers
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member::deleteL7PoolMembers Delete load balancer members Overview Delete given members from load balancer and return load balancer object with listeners, pools and members populated Parameters Name Type Description l7PoolUuid string memberUuids array of strings Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7MemberObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancer

Parameters Name Type Description l7PoolUuid string members SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7Member[] Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7MemberObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_LoadBalancer
